co.cask.cdap.etl.api

Interface Transformation<IN,OUT>

  • Type Parameters:
    IN - Type of input object
    OUT - Type of output object
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BatchSink, BatchSource, Transform

    @Beta
public interface Transformation<IN,OUT>
    Transforms an input object into zero or more output objects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void transform(IN input, Emitter<OUT> emitter)
      Transform the input and emit output using Emitter.

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        void transform(IN input,
             Emitter<OUT> emitter)
               throws Exception
        Transform the input and emit output using Emitter.
        Parameters:
        input - input data to be transformed
        emitter - Emitter to emit data to the next stage
        Throws:
        Exception - if there's an error during this method invocation
